about_the_game:
Fiesta Animal is a party multiplayer game 5v5 online. Play with friends and your family! cooperation and friendship are your best tools to victory. Run, jump, swimming and laugh as much as you want!

SATISFACTORY AND FUN RAG DOLL SYSTEM

All players can fall into the water with fun poses, take the lift, cross the map over mobile platforms and much more!

- You can diving into an orange juice or into a milk bowl.

CREATE YOUR MULTIPLAYER PARTY AS YOU LIKE

Play fun game modes in different levels. Choose your team and win!

- The modes are: Football (Soccer), Domination, Team vs Team and Escape.

MANY ANIMALS FOR BATTLE

Select your favorite character and prepare for the chaos!

- You can choose: Dogs, cats, horses, tigers, penguins... even a unicorn.

DO YOU WANT MORE FUN?

In Fiesta Animal you can play fast both online and offline alone or with your friends, always ready to win.

- Make a private match and invite your friends and family or play without connection.

- Environments like pirate ships, giant toasters, secret laboratories, castles, trains and much more...

I'm a solo developer and I try to make fun and innovative games for you. Please be patient and share your opinions and comments to improve the experience of this multiplayer game for the whole family.

If you want to give ideas and suggestions you can write to me by email at chocolatepotatogames@gmail.com

Features of guys falling multiplayer with friends:

This guys fall in every moment and can stumble with crazy obstacles, you can smash to animals in this party. Playing with friends to this guys fallen is very fun because is a multiplayer experience with your friends. Run, jump, stumble, swim, fall is the actions of your funny animal.

Play multiplayer with your best friends to this guy falls multiplayer to be the first and win. Select your favorite map of falling or stumbling and run guys!. The party is begin and the animals is ready to run to the victory, try don't fall in the jumping levels and avoid stumble your guys.

In this massive multiplayer party you can join online with others players in a fun battle royale. Prepare to running to chaos and stumbling so fun. Run and stumble and fall in battle teams where you need survival and team play in different game modes. Survive to the multiplayer chaos with friends and family.

Fall and run in creative maps full of fun against others players multiplayer. Find the exit, play team football and runs faster to win in battles of multiplayer chaos. Family can survive to multiplayer party running, falling and stumbling.

Your animal can be different and unique to run to victory and survive this battle multiplayer with friends. Smooth graphics and low specs are present in the online team chaos royale with family. Find the way to play with friends multiplayer and others world players.

Test your skills jumping and running when the party is begin and show your power to others guys. Animals are fast and run for next round very easy, you need be a faster guy of battle multiplayer with friend.

Don't confuse with others stumbling multiplayer parties, this is an original fun guys friends falling multiplayer. The best party is a guys with your friends falling on levels full of multiplayer fun, smashing and jumping around of incredibles and different game modes.

Now you can explore one world full of stumbling with falls and fun, colorful falling levels, mixed game modes that you can select and find your best way to play.

The guys multiplayer stumbling experience offer a lot of hours of fun, your family and friend are in the party of falling waiting for you. The first guy cross the finish line is the real winner of the escape game mode, the last falling guy is the brave player of the multiplayer family battle royale. Much more fun is waiting for you when the play multiplayer experience is out, don't wait any longer and get ready to join the party with friends to multiplayer royale, fall with your guys and run to victory.

CONTENT:

- Almost 30 characters, like dog, cat, duck, unicorn...

- 4 Gamemodes: Domination, Escape, Soccer, Team vs Team

- 12 maps: bath, train, castle, pirates ships...

- 5 weapons. Freezer, Hammer, Racket, Electric gun, bomb.

- Music: Retro.

- Fun.

name: Fiesta Animal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: These sweet animals are ready to fight. The funniest chaos is coming!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
